infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to allow you to add location-based reminders to your notes.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location in the background to alert you about notes when you enter a specified area, even when the app is closed or not in use.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location in the background to alert you about notes when you enter a specified area, even when the app is closed or not in use.
